name: Beautiful Day
description: This game is mostly just my first experiment with Twine. I want to expand on the story here, but I'm not sure if Twine is the format I want to make it in. I kind of want to make it into an action rpg but I don't really feel ready to take on a project of that scale yet. So for now I'm treating this just as an experiment or prototype that I hope to build into something bigger at some point in the future.
